item.title: LU
item.description: score:168 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd is a leading financial services enabler for small business owners in China, which indicates strong market potential. The company’s technology-empowered personal financial services platform offers personal lending and wealth management solutions, tapping into the growing demand for personal finance services in China.
